subject: Restore Google Drive backup with Firebase Auth
body:
Add OAuth integration for Google Drive backup:
- Request drive.appdata scope during Google sign-in
- Store and cache OAuth access token with 55-minute expiry
- Re-authenticate automatically when token expires
- Add getGoogleDriveAccessToken() to IAuthManager interface

Fix backup cancel flow bug:
- Errors now propagate properly instead of being silently caught
- Canceling Google popup no longer triggers password creation dialog
- Only continue to create new backup if "Not found backup location" error

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Restore Google Drive backup with Firebase Auth
